name: Homing Attack
description: Attack requires at least 1 cache die: Your next Precision attack bypasses cover. On hit, ignore all but 1 point of armor.
flavor: Targeting algorithms lock onto weak points.

name: Return Fire
description: When targeted by a ranged attack, you may use your current set of Precision to make a free attack against the attacker.
flavor: Your reflexes run on predictive code.

name: Momentum Spike
description: If you move at least 2 spaces on your turn, gain +1 to your next Agility or Physique action.
flavor: Movement is ammunition.

name: Echo
description: Project an illusory version of yourself. Once per scene, redirect any effect or check targeting you to the Echo.
flavor: Your timeline has spare versions of you to burn.

name: Scripted Deviation
description: The Width of the target entities next Ingenuity roll is reduced by the width used to activate this chip.
flavor: Reality glitches when you rewrite its stage directions.

name: Overclocked Charm
description: When you succeed on a Charisma roll, you can select one target to gain +1 to their next Agility action.
flavor: A smile, but with firmware support.

name: Viral Spotlight
description: Mark a target entity. Any entity that targets that entity, can reroll one die immediately. This mark requires one die per turn after activation to maintain.
flavor: Attention is a weapon.

name: Obscura Kernel
description: Once per session while this Chip is still equipped, nullify any trace or signature check against you.
flavor: You were never here.

name: Nullface
description: Remove any mark, lock, or traces targeting you.
flavor: Identity is optional.

name: Breakpoint
description: Until the beginning of your next turn, the entity targetted by this ability cannot use lower width that one one this one used. After activating this skill, you cannot take any other actions until your next turn.
flavor: Even monsters crash.

name: Recompile Pulse
description: Once per scene, re-roll one Cyber die. Treat the action used with that die as +1.
flavor: Rewrite. Retry. Succeed.

name: Charm Loop Injection
description: Apply a ''Mesmerized'' condition: target cannot willingly attack you unless provoked.
flavor: Hypnotic code woven through tone and gesture.

name: Coolant
description: Once per turn, you can reduce incoming damage by 1. You are inflicted with the ''Frozen'' condition.
flavor: Advanced from the people who brought you forced reboots.

name: Slapdash Bootloader
description: You may reroll any die with a value of 1 on Wit rolls.
flavor: Optimized? No. Effective? Somehow.

name: Multi-Processing Unit
description: Provide a +1 bonus to all allies next Cyber roll within the scene.
flavor: Clean architecture breeds clean victories.

name: Vertex Quiet-Core
description: Your Stealth rolls are immune to external penalties for one scene.
flavor: Silent, elegant, inevitable.

name: Firmware Torrent
description: For two rounds, you may treat any single die as matching any existing set.
flavor: A backdoor to raw potential.

name: Woden Stress Cycler
description: When activated, your next attack does extra damage equal to the amount of direct harm done to your COMP since your last turn.
flavor: Pain is data. Data is useful.

name: Mechane Servo-Pulse
description: On melee hit, shove target 1–2 spaces and impose ''-1 Width'' on their next physical action.
flavor: Made with the same tech that bends steel beams.

name: Hardjack
description: Force-open any jammed or locked mechanical device with physical torque.
flavor: If it resists, twist harder.

name: Arc-Sigil
description: Your next Ingenuity roll also counts as Performance, and vice-versa.
flavor: Old gods repurposed for modern workflows.

name: Totem Ward
description: Place a Totem. Allies within 2 spaces gain +1 defense against Spirit effects.
flavor: Mysticism meets modular hardware.

name: Auto-Compliance
description: Automatically Apply ''Error-State'' to a civilian or bureaucratic target.
flavor: Ensure cooperation—legally or otherwise.

name: Crypt-Mold
description: Infect a digital target with slow corruption. Each round they take 1 system stress until they perform a Cyber check.
flavor: It spreads like rumor and clings like guilt.

name: Snapdart
description: Agility or Precision attack. On hit, apply ''Shocked'' if target''s Agility is lower.
flavor: A tiny trick with outsized payoff.

name: Ghostnote
description: On a successful Performance roll, reduce the target's Confidence by 1 for the scene.
flavor: A whisper is all it takes to wreck certainty.

name: Backdoor Mapper
description: Scan any system for structural weak points. Your next Cyber/Engineering roll automatically reveals bypass options.
flavor: Every system keeps a secret; you know where to ask.

name: Adaptive Footwork
description: When rolling Agility, you can choose to immediately move 1 space, not using your normal movement. Once per session ignore forced movement.
flavor: The world adjusts to your pace.

name: Static Lash
description: A basic electrical strike that doesn't deal damage but applies ''Shocked'', and also reduces the target's Cyber score by 1.
flavor: A jolt that rewrites priorities.

name: Cryo Strike
description: On a melee attack, inflict ''Frozen'' condition. Target''s movement is halved next round.
flavor: Cold solves many problems.

name: Decay Drip
description: Until the target makes a Vitality check, their Physique is reduced by 1 at the end of every turn.
flavor: Life finds a way—into your bloodstream.

name: Glitchwave
description: You choose one die from the target's dice pool, they must reroll that die and keep the result.
flavor: Your existence stutters.

name: Sharp-set
description: If you attack an entity with a Precision action, the next Precision die you roll is Wild.
flavor: A subtle correction with massive payoff.

name: Overstep
description: When moving, you can always choose to ignore the first tile of hazardous terrain.
flavor: One clean leap solves a hundred problems.

name: Heat Sink
description: As a reaction, once per turn you can prevent either fire damage or the ''Burning'' condition.
flavor: Turn fire into a shrug.

name: Earthbind
description: Strike the ground, creating signals. All entities within 2 spaces reroll their die with the highest height in their pool.
flavor: The ground itself becomes your ally.

name: Watercoil
description: Form moisture into conduits. Until the next turn, all entities within 3 spaces of this Minor Action gain Water affinity until the start of your next turn.
flavor: Flow improves function.

name: Shroud
description: Project a shifting hologram. All attacks need to be one space closer to hit you until your next turn. Melee attacks still hit normally.
flavor: Distance is an illusion.

name: Voltage Anchor
description: Stabilize a circuit or device. Remove one electronic hazard or disable a trap''s trigger.
flavor: A grounding wire for chaos.

name: Pressure Point
description: Convert a melee hit into a nerve strike. Target loses 1 die from their next Physical roll.
flavor: Anatomy meets interface.

name: Wormhole
description: As an Action, you are instantly teleported three spaces away from an enemy entity of your choice within line of sight.
flavor: Bend space to your will.

name: Neural Spike
description: On a successful Ingenuity attack, the target is stunned for one round and takes additional damage equal to your Ingenuity score.
flavor: A strike to the mind that echoes through the body.

name: Old Prayer
description: At the very end of the current turn, you may heal any debuffed stats across any entities in the scene equal to the strength of this Action.
flavor: Ancient words coded into modern miracles.

name: Data Leech
description: On a successful Cyber attack, steal one die from the target's curent dice pool, this cannot be added to the cache.
flavor: Feed on the knowledge of others.

name: Pulsewave Shield
description: As a reaction, create a shockwave that pushes all adjacent enemies 2 spaces away and grants you +2 defense until your next turn.
flavor: A fortress built from kinetic energy.

name: Heart of Iron
description: Add +1 to your Confidence Score as long as this chip is equipped.
flavor: Steadfast resolve in a volatile world.

name: Neuroflash
description: A ranged attack with a range of 4 spaces. If this attack deals damage with your lucky numbers, the target is stunned for the next round.
flavor: A sudden jolt that scrambles the senses.

name: Phase Shift
description: Minor Action: Become intangible, passing through 1 space of solid objects.
flavor: Slip between the cracks of reality.

name: Bioforge
description: Action: For the power of the Action, gain +2 to Physique actions. You cannot be healed from any status effects while this chip is active.
flavor: Biotech that turns flesh into steel.

name: Specter
description: Reaction: After taking damage from an attack, become invisible until the start of your next turn. This effect ends if you take an Action or Reaction.
flavor: A ghost in the machine, unseen and untouchable.

name: Warm Presence
description: Whenever you target an entity with a Charisma buff, you may also heal faults equal to Action strength.
flavor: A cloak woven from pure data streams.

name: Multi-Threading
description: As an action, you can increase a willing entities Action strength by 1
flavor: Bend time and code to your will.

name: Flesh Focus
description: As a reaction, become untargetable by Spirit attacks until the start of your next turn.
flavor: Your mind is a fortress against the ethereal.

name: Deadpan
description: You have +1 Defense against all Spirit abilities
flavor: Your expression is unreadable, even to machines.

name: Slick Circuitry
description: You may move one space as a Free Action on your turn, once per round.
flavor: Fluid movement through digital and physical spaces.

name: Opportunity Attack
description: Reaction: When an enemy leaves your melee range, make a free melee attack against them, using what Physical die you currently have.
flavor: Seize the moment, strike with precision.

name: Rip and Tear
description: Whenever an attack has a Width of 3 or more, apply the ''Ruptured'' condition to the target.
flavor: Tear through defenses with brute force.

name: Jacked
description: Gain +1 to your Physique score while this chip is equipped.
flavor: Strength amplified through cybernetic enhancement.

name: Brain Shield
description: Gain +2 Defense against Ingenuity attacks.
flavor: A mental barrier against cognitive assaults.

name: Silent Step
description: Gain +1 to Stealth rolls while this chip is equipped.
flavor: Blend into the digital shadows.

name: Anti-Virus
description: Gain +1 Defense against Cyber attacks.
flavor: A cloak of digital obscurity.

name: Last Breath Protocol
description: While you are at 1 Vitality, if your first Vitality dice rolled on the turn is a 4 or higher, you may negate 2 Fault Dice that turn.
flavor: Swift code manipulation for rapid results.

name: Adrenaline Surge
description: You are immune to the effects of Fault Dice while using your Confidence score for actions.
flavor: A burst of raw energy when you need it most.

name: Synaptic Strike
description: Any Precision attack with 3 or more Power applies a level of Hit-Stun to the target entity.
flavor: A precise hit that disrupts neural function.

name: Cyberfocus
description: If you didn't roll any 6s on your last Cyber action, your next Cyber actions gains 2 Power.
flavor: Focus your digital mind for enhanced performance.

name: Kinetic Buffer
description: Gain +1 Defense to all Physical attacks.
flavor: Absorb impact with reinforced cybernetics.

name: Burnweave Core
description: Any Burn effects that you inflicted add an extra Fault Die on its first turn.
flavor: Ignite your attacks with enhanced intensity.

name: Hex Spike
description: Minor Action: Add an extra stack of a status effect applied to an entity this turn.
flavor: Amplify your control over status effects.

name: Cortical Shard
description: If you target an Entity with a 2 Power or higher Wit action, apply 1 Hit-Stun to the target.
flavor: A sharp incantation that leaves a lasting impression.

name: Magnetron
description: Any Voltage attack with 3 or more Power applies the ''Stunned'' condition to the target entity.
flavor: Harness electromagnetic forces for devastating effects.

name: Noise Bomb
description: Reaction: Negate any Cyber attacks targeting you if the attack height is below 5
flavor: Disrupt digital targeting with a burst of static.

name: Frostbite
description: Any Cryo attack with 3 or more Power applies the ''Frozen'' condition to the target entity.
flavor: Chill your enemies to the bone with enhanced cold.

name: Echo Chamber
description: When you perform 2 Actions or more on a Performance roll, all allies within 2 spaces gain +1 to their next turn's rolls.
flavor: Your voice resonates, empowering those around you.

name: Graviton Well
description: Minor Action: Pull all entities within 2 spaces towards you by 1 space.
flavor: Manipulate gravitational forces to control the battlefield.

name: Neural Net
description: Once per turn, you may treat one cache die as matching any existing set.
flavor: A web of interconnected thoughts and data.

name: Glitch Influence
description: Instead of dealing direct damage, lower the target entity's Confidence by 1 for each Power level of the attack
flavor: A subtle manipulation that undermines confidence.

name: Double Speak
description: If a Charisma attack hits, and the Power of the attack exceeds the target's Confidence, apply 1 Hit-Stun to the target.
flavor: Words that cut deeper than any blade.

name: Thermal Regulator
description: Gain +1 Defense against Fire and Cryo attacks.
flavor: Maintain optimal temperature in extreme conditions.

name: Circuit Breaker
description: Reaction: When targeted by a Cyber attack, negate the attack if the attack height is below 3.
flavor: Disrupt digital assaults with a sudden jolt.

name: Panic in the Core
description: Any Power 3 or higher Ingenuity attack applies the ''Confused'' condition to the target entity.
flavor: Overwhelm your target's mind with chaotic code.

name: Flame Vision
description: Action: Inflict 1 Burn to any enemy within visible range. This effect is removed while no longer in line of sight.
flavor: See the world through a fiery lens.

name: Supreme Vigor
description: While this chip is equipped, you gain +1 Vitality
flavor: Endurance enhanced through cybernetic augmentation.

name: Night-Runner
description: If you remained hidden on your turn using Stealth, your next roll gets a +1
flavor: Master the art of moving unseen.

name: Assault Matrix
description: Applies Confused, reduce the target enity's Cyber score by 1 for the scene.
flavor: Disrupt the digital mind with calculated chaos.
